title: Plastic Has A Big Carbon Footprint — But That Isn't The Whole Story
body: Plastic waste litters cities, oceans and even the air. Largely overlooked is how making plastic affects the environment. Plastic is a big contributor to global warming. So are its alternatives.
readable_content: - This is a part of the text from NPR dated July 9th, 2019. The article discusses the environmental impact of plastic production and alternatives, including their carbon footprint and the potential emissions. It also highlights the challenges in replacing plastic with other materials and the need for careful consideration in choosing alternatives to plastic.
summary:
The text acknowledges the environmental impact of plastic production and the challenges in finding suitable alternatives. It emphasizes the need for careful consideration in choosing alternatives to plastic. Overall, the sentiment is balanced and calls for a thoughtful approach to addressing the issue.
